reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My parents stay here whenver they come to visit me in Harrow. Each time I offer to give up my bedroom to accommodate them but they always say no as they really enjoy staying here! The place is well located, under 10min walk to town (my parents are mid70s) and the owners are really friendly and make you feel at home. A great place to stay in Harrow as the majority of the hotels are run down or too expensive!
reviews.title: Great friendly service!

reviews.text: We were part of a wedding party that stayed at this B&B and what a great find - it's excellent value for money - like home from home with the personal touch. The owner was very welcoming, warm and genuinely cares about his guests - offering us a cup of tea on arrival and booking us a taxi too - nothing seemed to much to ask. The rooms are basic, but comfortable & very clean. The location is good also - 7mins to Harrow on Hill tube station. Definitely recommend staying here.
reviews.title: Home from Home - clean & excellent value for money

reviews.text: I recently stayed four nights at the Rhondda B&B in Harrow and can highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Very Good B&B 25 Min by Tube to Baker Steet

reviews.text: Its rooms are very clean with en-suite bathrooms and breakfast is served from 06:30 onwards which is also convenient for business travellers. Parking is available upon request (driveway). The host and hostess are very friendly and very helpfull and are happy to help you with your requests. The tube station Harrow-on-the hill with direct service to Baker Street and the financial district (Aldgate, Metropolitan line, zone 5-6) is just five minutes away. A small Spar Market ist just accross the street as well as several restaurants and a small shopping centre. The area is quite safe which was improtant for me a single traveller (residential area).
reviews.title: Good Breakfast in North London

reviews.text: All in all, if you are looking for a nice B&B with value for money (Single bedroom approx GBP 35,00 with breakfast) you do not have to look any further.
reviews.title: IMMACULATE B&B, FRIENDLY STAFF, good value
